org.trianacode.annotation

Interface TaskAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTaskAware

    public interface TaskAware
    Interface that wants to know a little about it's name and how many connections it has. The setters are called before the process method so the values can be retrieved in that method. NOTE: these properties become available within the annotated class's @Process method
